Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency }or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.MHXQ6uBfaRCgUfgW]{Basic Offensive Form}

Benefits

When using a psiblade, a character may attack with a psiblade at a -1 Combat Point cost. If they do, they do not use their POW when calculating damage. This reduction applies to all attacks that take benefit of this Combat Point reduction.
system.summary: Trade POW bonus for -1 CP cost to attack
